name: Galaxy S21
description: Flagship smartphone with advanced features. 6.2-inch display, Exynos 2100 processor, 12GB RAM, 128GB storage, triple rear camera (12MP + 12MP + 64MP), 4000mAh battery. Elevate your mobile experience with the Galaxy S21's stunning display and powerful camera system.

name: Galaxy A52
description: Mid-range smartphone with a versatile camera. 6.5-inch display, Snapdragon 720G processor, 6GB RAM, 128GB storage, quad rear camera (64MP + 12MP + 5MP + 5MP), 4500mAh battery. Capture every moment in vivid detail with the Galaxy A52's high-quality camera setup.

name: Galaxy Note 20
description: Productivity powerhouse with S Pen support. 6.7-inch display, Exynos 990 processor, 8GB RAM, 256GB storage, triple rear camera (12MP + 64MP + 12MP), 4300mAh battery. Boost your productivity with the Galaxy Note 20's large display and S Pen functionality.

name: Galaxy Z Flip 3
description: Stylish foldable phone with a compact design. 6.7-inch foldable AMOLED display, Snapdragon 888 processor, 8GB RAM, 128GB storage, dual rear camera (12MP + 12MP), 3300mAh battery. Embrace innovation with the Galaxy Z Flip 3's foldable display and sleek design.

name: Galaxy M32
description: Budget-friendly smartphone with a large battery. 6.4-inch display, MediaTek Helio G80 processor, 4GB RAM, 64GB storage, quad rear camera (64MP + 8MP + 2MP + 2MP), 6000mAh battery. Enjoy long-lasting battery life and reliable performance with the Galaxy M32.

name: Redmi Note 10 Pro
description: Powerful mid-range device with a large display. 6.67-inch display, Snapdragon 732G processor, 6GB RAM, 128GB storage, quad rear camera (108MP + 8MP + 5MP + 2MP), 5020mAh battery. Immerse yourself in a cinematic experience with the Redmi Note 10 Pro.

name: Mi 11 Lite
description: Slim and stylish smartphone with a focus on design. 6.55-inch display, Snapdragon 732G processor, 6GB RAM, 128GB storage, triple rear camera (64MP + 8MP + 5MP), 4250mAh battery. Experience elegance and performance with the Mi 11 Lite.

name: Poco X3 Pro
description: High-performance mid-range phone for gaming enthusiasts. 6.67-inch display, Snapdragon 860 processor, 6GB RAM, 128GB storage, quad rear camera (48MP + 8MP + 2MP + 2MP), 5160mAh battery. Unleash gaming prowess with the Poco X3 Pro's powerful specs.

name: Redmi K40
description: Affordable 5G smartphone with a sleek design. 6.67-inch display, Snapdragon 870 processor, 6GB RAM, 128GB storage, triple rear camera (48MP + 8MP + 5MP), 4520mAh battery. Stay connected with 5G speeds on the Redmi K40.

name: Xiaomi Mi 10T Pro
description: Flagship-level performance with a high-refresh-rate display. 6.67-inch display, Snapdragon 865 processor, 8GB RAM, 256GB storage, triple rear camera (108MP + 13MP + 5MP), 5000mAh battery. Experience smooth visuals and top-tier specs with the Mi 10T Pro.

name: Realme 7 Pro
description: Feature-packed mid-range phone with super-fast charging. 6.4-inch display, Snapdragon 720G processor, 6GB RAM, 128GB storage, quad rear camera (64MP + 8MP + 2MP + 2MP), 4500mAh battery. Stay ahead with the Realme 7 Pro's impressive performance and quick charging capabilities.

name: Realme X7 Max
description: 5G-enabled smartphone for high-speed connectivity. 6.43-inch display, MediaTek Dimensity 1200 processor, 8GB RAM, 128GB storage, triple rear camera (64MP + 8MP + 2MP), 4500mAh battery. Experience the future with Realme X7 Max's 5G capabilities.

name: Realme GT Neo
description: Performance-oriented mid-range phone with a sleek design. 6.43-inch display, MediaTek Dimensity 1200 processor, 6GB RAM, 128GB storage, triple rear camera (64MP + 8MP + 2MP), 4500mAh battery. Elevate your mobile gaming experience with the Realme GT Neo.

name: Realme Narzo 30 Pro
description: Budget-friendly 5G phone with a high-refresh-rate display. 6.5-inch display, MediaTek Dimensity 800U processor, 6GB RAM, 64GB storage, triple rear camera (48MP + 8MP + 2MP), 5000mAh battery. Experience 5G speed without breaking the bank with the Realme Narzo 30 Pro.

name: Realme C25s
description: Entry-level smartphone with a massive battery. 6.5-inch display, MediaTek Helio G85 processor, 4GB RAM, 64GB storage, triple rear camera (13MP + 2MP + 2MP), 6000mAh battery. Enjoy long-lasting battery life with the Realme C25s.

name: Oppo Reno 6 Pro
description: Sleek and powerful mid-range smartphone. 6.55-inch display, MediaTek Dimensity 1200 processor, 8GB RAM, 128GB storage, triple rear camera (64MP + 8MP + 2MP), 4500mAh battery. Elevate your style with the Oppo Reno 6 Pro's elegant design and powerful features.

name: Oppo F19 Pro
description: Camera-centric mid-range smartphone. 6.43-inch display, MediaTek Helio P95 processor, 8GB RAM, 128GB storage, quad rear camera (48MP + 8MP + 2MP + 2MP), 4310mAh battery. Capture every detail with Oppo F19 Pro's advanced camera system.

name: Oppo A74
description: Affordable smartphone with a large display. 6.43-inch display, Snapdragon 662 processor, 6GB RAM, 128GB storage, triple rear camera (48MP + 2MP + 2MP), 5000mAh battery. Experience a budget-friendly option with the Oppo A74.

name: Oppo Find X3 Neo
description: Premium flagship with a focus on performance. 6.55-inch display, Snapdragon 870 processor, 12GB RAM, 256GB storage, quad rear camera (50MP + 16MP + 13MP + 2MP), 4500mAh battery. Enjoy top-tier specs with the Oppo Find X3 Neo.

name: Oppo A54
description: Budget-friendly phone with a modern design. 6.51-inch display, MediaTek Helio P35 processor, 4GB RAM, 64GB storage, triple rear camera (13MP + 2MP + 2MP), 5000mAh battery. Embrace affordability with the Oppo A54.

name: Vivo V21
description: Slim and stylish mid-range phone with a focus on selfies. 6.44-inch display, MediaTek Dimensity 800U processor, 8GB RAM, 128GB storage, dual rear camera (64MP + 8MP), 4000mAh battery. Capture stunning selfies and enjoy a sleek design with the Vivo V21.

name: Vivo X60 Pro
description: Flagship with ZEISS optics for superior photography. 6.56-inch display, Snapdragon 888 processor, 12GB RAM, 256GB storage, quad rear camera (50MP + 48MP + 32MP + 8MP), 4200mAh battery. Unleash your photography skills with the Vivo X60 Pro's advanced camera system.

name: Vivo Y73
description: Stylish mid-range phone with an emphasis on design. 6.44-inch display, MediaTek Helio G95 processor, 8GB RAM, 128GB storage, triple rear camera (64MP + 2MP + 2MP), 4000mAh battery. Experience elegance and performance with the Vivo Y73.

name: Vivo S1 Pro
description: Feature-packed mid-range phone with a focus on photography. 6.38-inch display, Snapdragon 665 processor, 8GB RAM, 128GB storage, quad rear camera (48MP + 8MP + 2MP + 2MP), 4500mAh battery. Capture every moment in detail with the Vivo S1 Pro.

name: Vivo Y20
description: Budget-friendly smartphone with a large battery. 6.51-inch display, MediaTek Helio P35 processor, 4GB RAM, 64GB storage, triple rear camera (13MP + 2MP + 2MP), 5000mAh battery. Enjoy reliable performance and long-lasting battery life with the Vivo Y20.

name: Vivo Y73
description: Stylish mid-range phone with an emphasis on design. 6.44-inch display, MediaTek Helio G95 processor, 8GB RAM, 128GB storage, triple rear camera (64MP + 2MP + 2MP), 4000mAh battery. Experience elegance and performance with the Vivo Y73.
